description: This file defines an ErrorBoundary React component in TypeScript that catches JavaScript errors in child components, logs them, and renders a fallback UI when an error occurs.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component that provides error boundary functionality to catch and handle errors in its child components.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: Static method that updates the state to indicate an error has occurred and stores the error message.

methods.name: componentDidCatch
methods.description: Lifecycle method that logs the error and error information to the console.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Render method that displays an error message UI when an error has been caught, otherwise renders children components.
